bgDescription:
An extremely rare seasoning with an unrivaled and wonderful aroma that can be smelled when the bottle is opened.
It is said that adding it to Dish not only adds flavor to the dish, but depending on the Dish, it also improves a certain Sensor ability of the eater.
"What the hell is that smell? It smells so good ......"
"I know ...... It's the smell of motor oil! It's the best smelling motor oil I've ever smelled!"
"What?"
